name: Riviera Resources, Inc.
description: Riviera Resources, Inc. is an independent oil and gas company focused on the acquisition and development of oil and natural gas properties in the United States. Founded in 2019, Riviera has built a strong portfolio of assets primarily located in the Mid-Continent region, including Oklahoma and Texas. The company is committed to optimizing its operations and enhancing shareholder value through disciplined capital allocation and strategic acquisitions. Riviera aims to leverage its technical expertise and operational efficiencies to maximize production and reserves while maintaining a focus on environmental stewardship and sustainability. By utilizing advanced technologies and innovative practices, Riviera strives to improve recovery rates and reduce operational costs. The company is also dedicated to fostering strong relationships with its stakeholders, including employees, partners, and the communities in which it operates. With a proactive approach to risk management and a commitment to safety, Riviera Resources is well-positioned to navigate the challenges of the energy sector and capitalize on emerging opportunities.
